TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGridItemProvider

Docs.summary: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Controls that implement <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.
Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> control pattern.

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns the property, which is stored in an internal variable.
[!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGridItem.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgriditem.vb#104)]

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns the property for an item in a grid whose items always span a single column.
[!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGridItem.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgriditem.vb#107)]

Docs.summary: Gets a UI Automation provider that implements and represents the container of the cell or item.
Docs.value: A UI Automation provider that implements the and represents the cell or item container.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns an object, stored as an internal variable that represents the grid container. This object implements <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot>.
[!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGridItem.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgriditem.vb#108)]

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the cell or item.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns the property, which is stored in an internal variable.
[!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGridItem.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgriditem.vb#105)]

Docs.summary: Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns the property for an item in a grid whose items always span a single row.
